properties.entry: Find New World. Try to look at left part of the map.
Found new colony.
Produce 30 cigars.
Sell cigars in Europe.
Find New World and found there a colony. Try to drag ship to the left.
You should not go back Europe. You come from there to find new world. New world should on the West.
Ship can't move more in this turn more. Ship don't have any action points. You can check it in right panel where are ship's details. Now press 'Next Turn' button.
First turn with ship Try to find New World.
You found New World. Now lets sail close at try to disembark. Your next task is to found new colony.
Great. You found new colony. Now it's on you how it will thrive.

Click at colony a and open colony detail. place unit at field to start producing tobacco. Place another unit to cigar house and start producing cigars from tobacco. Carefully watch amount of food at colony. When food is depleted colonist will die. Your next task is to produce 30 cigars.
Finally. You have enough cigars. Now place all cigars to ship a take them to Europe. Sell all cigars in Europe.
Heureka!. This is the way how to make some gold..
Congratulations. Your first mission is successfully finished.
You can't declare independence. Declaring of independence upset your King. King will try to conquer colonies back by force. You are not strong enough to fight with king.
Found three colonies.
Make 5000 gold, you can sell goods in Europe.
Raise army.
You found first colony, now you have to build proud and wealth nations.
Now you'll need more colonies. Buy some colonist and found at least 3 colonies.
Perfect. Now you have enought colonies.
You'll need lot of gold. Gain 5000 gold from business with Europe.
Great. Now you have 5000 gold.
Now make and army. You'l need at least 15 colonits. Colonists will fight for you.
Great, you have army.
Fantastic. You did well. Now continue to next mission.
Declare independence.
Conquer king's army.
Podařilo se ti dojít daleko. Nyní más bohatou a silnou společnost. Posledni krok je získání nezávislostí.
První krok je, že musíš vyhlásit nezávislost. S tím optarně. Počitej, že se král hodně naštve a pošle na tebe silné vojsko s jediním cílem - zničit tě.
Tak. Teď jsi se vydal na nevratnou cestu k válce a k nezávislosti. Co nevidět přijede silné expediční vojsko. Připrav se.
Od této chvíle už nemůžeš jezdit do Evropy. Zdá se, že se král hodně zlobí.
Sláva. Podařilo se to porazit královké vojsko.
Zde tvoje cesta končí. Pro svůj mladý národ jsi vydobyl svobodu. Všechny oběti položené k dosažení vznešeného cíle se mnohokrát vrátili.
